Class Block2Option

  • java.lang.Object

    public class Block2Option
extends CoapOption
    CoAP Block2 options (RFC 7959).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block2Option

        public Block2Option(CoapOption co)
        Creates a new Block2 option.
        Parameters:
        co - CoapOption to be copied

      • Block2Option

        public Block2Option(long block_num,
                    boolean more_blocks,
                    int size_exp)
        Creates a new Block2 option.
        Parameters:
        block_num - the relative number of the block (NUM) within a sequence of blocks with the given size
        more_blocks - whether more blocks are following (M)
        size_exp - the 2-power exponent of the size of the block (equals to SZX + 4)

    • Method Detail

      • getSZX

        public int getSZX()
        Gets SZX, that is the 2-power exponent of the size of the block minus 4.
        Returns:
        the SZX value

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Gets the size of the block.
        Returns:
        the size

      • moreBlocks

        public boolean moreBlocks()
        Whether there are more blocks (flag M).
        Returns:
        true if there are more blocks (that is if flag M equals to 1)

      • getSequenceNumber

        public long getSequenceNumber()
        Gets the block sequence number.
        Returns:
        the block sequence number
